name: RetrieveMultipleOrders
description:
Retrieve multiple orders using their IDs.

This tool retrieves details of multiple orders from Square using their IDs. It ignores any non-existent order IDs, ensuring no errors are returned for invalid IDs.

parameters.name: order_ids_list
parameters.description: An array of order IDs to retrieve, with a maximum of 100 per request.

value_schema.description: The IDs of the orders to retrieve. A maximum of 100 orders can be retrieved per request.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: Optional location ID for the orders. Omit to use the current merchant's ID.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the location for these orders. This field is optional: omit it to retrieve
orders within the scope of the current authorization's merchant ID.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description:
The ID of the location for these orders. This field is optional: omit it to retrieve
orders within the scope of the current authorization's merchant ID.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the location for these orders. This field is optional: omit it to retrieve
orders within the scope of the current authorization's merchant ID.

parameters.name: order_ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the orders to retrieve. A maximum of 100 orders can be retrieved per request.

value_schema.description: The IDs of the orders to retrieve. A maximum of 100 orders can be retrieved per request.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
